article_title: Fighting drugs one baby at a time
article_text:
Beckley, WV (25801)

Today

Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 82F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Partly cloudy. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 61F. Winds light and variable.

article_metadata.author: Jessica Farrish REGISTER-HERALD REPORTER

og.description: In a state with the highest rate of drug overdose deaths in the nation, southern West Virginia leads the state in the percentage of babies born addicted to drugs.
